channel.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
channel.description:
I caught up to the current episodes in any show worth watching so I had to find a new one. Looked at the top rated tv shows and saw Breaking Bad, heres the description.
Informed he has terminal cancer, an underachieving chemistry genius turned high school chemistry teacher turns to using his expertise in chemistry to provide a legacy for his family... by producing the world's highest quality crystal meth.
The show starts out slow, but this guy turns into a fucking badass at the end of season 1 and now I cant stop watching, anyone else seen this show?

item.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

10 episodes into season 2, and I’m still in love.

Read full topic

item.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:20, topic:428373”]I think that’s due to the way American TV tends to go until its cancelled whereas over here in the UK we tend to just produce a few short but high quality seasons: Fawlty Towers, Sherlock, Black books are just some examples off the top of my head.

I’m not opposed to either methodology because I feel some UK shows could have gone further but the quitting while your ahead does produce great TV.

I will always hate Fox for cancelling Arrested Development, Firefly and Lie to me though.[/quote]
Breaking Bad is headed into it’s last season, might be split into two seasons though
also, on topic of hating fox, they cancelled terminator

Read full topic

item.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I think that’s due to the way American TV tends to go until its cancelled whereas over here in the UK we tend to just produce a few short but high quality seasons: Fawlty Towers, Sherlock, Black books are just some examples off the top of my head.

I’m not opposed to either methodology because I feel some UK shows could have gone further but the quitting while your ahead does produce great TV.

I will always hate Fox for cancelling Arrested Development, Firefly and Lie to me though.

Read full topic

item.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Frell:

and finally read every single season’s plot and this seems like it is the absolute best and most interesting show on tv right now.

like most half decent american tv shows recently the later seasons don’t quite live up to expectation, the same thing happened with dexter and boardwalk empire in particular

not that they’re bad to watch they just lose that initial spark

on a sidenote: badger and skinny pete need a bloody web based sideshow already

Read full topic

item.title: Breaking Bad is fucking awesome?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Brolapse:

I watched the whole of the first season a week or two ago not knowing what to expect I’d just heard people talking about it. Was blown away by how awesome it was but I just can’t bring myself to watch the second season and I don’t know why.

Ah some things are disappointing for me so far, as in I wanted them to go differently, but overall I like the way its gone up to where im at things dont really start getting reallllly good until season 3 at least thats as far as I am, but season 2 was better than season 1 imo

Read full topic
